summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of onboarding layout changes. Fixed header/footer layout with scrollable center content working correctly across all 4 onboarding pages. All key functionality tested successfully including navigation flow, step progress indicators, form interactions, modal functionality, and responsive design.

ui_bugs.issue: Back button navigation timeout from Connect Marketplace to Store Details page - navigation may be delayed but functionality works

passed_tests: Fixed header with logo and step counter visible on all 4 pages
Fixed footer with appropriate navigation buttons (Back/Continue/Start Sync)
Step labels display single-line on desktop using whitespace-nowrap
Correct step counter display (Step X of 4) across all pages
Progress bar shows proper done/active states
Scrollable center content with overflow-y-auto functionality
Choose Plan: Plan carousel, pills, and modal functionality working
Choose Plan: Continue button navigates to Store Details correctly
Store Details: Form dropdowns (country, marketplace) working properly
Store Details: Auto-currency update based on country selection
Store Details: Optional section toggle and form validation working
Store Details: Navigation Back to Choose Plan and Continue to Connect Marketplace
Connect Marketplace: Marketplace grid and connection panels working
Connect Marketplace: Connection simulation and status updates functioning
Connect Marketplace: Skip warning functionality working correctly
Review: All summary cards displayed correctly in scrollable area
Review: Edit buttons navigate back to appropriate pages
Review: Start Sync navigation to syncing page working
Header and footer remain fixed during content scrolling on all pages
Plan selection and confirmation working across pages
Marketplace connection flow working within scrollable panels
